info.title: WarframeStat.us API
info.description:
Simple API for data from the game Warframe.
[Parser Docs](https://wfcd.github.io/warframe-worldstate-parser/)
[Items Types](https://github.com/WFCD/warframe-items/blob/master/index.d.ts)

tags.name: Searchable
tags.description: Follows a consistent pattern for searching data

tags.name: Rivens
tags.description: Proxy data for Digital Extreme's semi-regular Riven Data dumps

tags.name: Static Processing Data
tags.description: Direct access via API to the data we use to parse the worldstate

get.summary: Get Warframe Worldstate Data for the provided platform
get.description: The full translated Warframe Worldstate
Description and rewards for Alerts
Description of the currently active arbitration
Data about the missions for the current archon hunt
Data on the Vome/Fass cycle for the Cambion Drift on Deimos
Data on the day/night cycle for Cetus on Earth
Data on each day and week's conclave challenges

get.summary: Get Construction Progress for Fomorians and Razorbacks
get.description: Construction percentages for showing how far constructed the enemy fleets are.
Darvo's Daily Deal details
Dark Sector (Rail Wars) data and history. Digital Extremes has emptied several of these.

get.summary: Get the current Earth rotation information
get.description: The current Earth day/night cycle progress.
Events, such as Fomorian Attacks are included here
Information about current Void Fissure missions
Popular Deals, discounts, featured deals.
Any current modifiers applied to all users, such as double drops.
Data on invasion missions, such as estimated completion time, rewards, etc.
Current Kuva Mission listing (provided by [semlar](https://10o.io/kuvalog)).
Translated News items from the worldstate
The Current cycle and challenges of Nightwave, a battle-pass-esque rotation and challenge system
Data about current acolytes attacking the Sol System
Data about averages, deviations, medians, miniums, and maxes for all rivens for the provided platform
Data about averages, deviations, medians, miniums, and maxes for rivens whose name match the query for the provided platform

get.summary: Get the current Sentient Outpost, if any
get.description: Status data for current Sentient Outpost, if any. Parsed source is combined data from DE\'s worldstate and [semlar\'s data](https://semlar.com/anomaly.json)

id.description: Identifier for the mission node with active indicator

activation.description: When the mission became or becomes active

expiry.description: When the mission became or becomes inactive

previous.description: Estimation data for the last mission that was active. Could also be the current.

activation.description: When the mission became or becomes active

expiry.description: When the mission became or becomes inactive

get.description: Status data for Simaris' Sanctuary
Data about the missions for the current sortie
Data about the missions for the current sortie
Cycling through different nodes each day, these are a general listing of the nodes that each syndicate will use for the day.

get.summary: Get the timestamp that the current worldstate was generated at.
get.description: The time that the worldstate was last generated

get.summary: Get the current state of the Orb Vallis
get.description: The current cycle of the Orb Vallis warm/cold cycle

get.summary: Get the current Void Trader Information
get.description: Information on the current Void Trader offerings, or when he will arrive.
Available Arcane Enhancements

get.summary: Get Arcane Enhancement Data based on the query
get.description: Available Arcane Enhancements
Data about conclave challenges

get.summary: Get conclave challenge data based on the query
get.description: Data about conclave challenges
Percentages for Warframe drops in different areas of the game
Data about events

get.summary: Get Event-specific Data based on the query
get.description: Data about events
Strings for translating faction identifiers.

get.summary: Get Faction translation information based on the query.
get.description: Strings for translating faction identifiers.
Fissure translation identifiers

get.summary: Get Fissure Modifier translation data based on the query.
get.description: Fissure translation identifiers
Item information.

get.summary: Get data for the closest matching single item
get.description: Item information.

get.summary: Get data for all matching items
get.description: Item information, such as name, unique name, type, and image name.
Get language strings to assist translation. (Prefer the /languages/search/:query route)

get.summary: Get Language strings for Warframe based on the query.
get.description: Get language strings to assist translation.
Locales supported by the API
Mission Type information to aid translating identifiers

get.summary: Get MissionType Translation Keys based on the query
get.description: Mission Type information to aid translating identifiers

get.summary: Get data for the closest matching single mod
get.description: Mod information.

get.summary: Get data for all matching mods
get.description: Mod information, such as name, unique name, type, and image name.
Operation Types information to aid translating identifiers for global upgrades

get.summary: Get operation types data based on the query.
get.description: Operation Types information to aid translating identifiers for global upgrades
Persistent Enemy translation information for aiding translation of identifiers.

get.summary: Get Persistent Enemy translation data based on the query.
get.description: Persistent Enemy translation information for aiding translation of identifiers.

get.summary: Get Sol Node information and translation data.
get.description: Sol Node translation information for aiding the translation of identifiers.

get.summary: Get Sol Node information and translation data based on the query.
get.description: Sol Node translation information for aiding the translation of identifiers.
Sortie translation information for assisting translation of identifiers.

get.summary: Get Sortie translation information based on the query.
get.description: Sortie translation information for assisting translation of identifiers.
Information to assist translating syndicate identifiers.

get.summary: Get Syndicate translation data based on the query.
get.description: Information to assist translating syndicate identifiers.
Tutorials data from DE

get.summary: Get Tutorials Data based on the query
get.description: Tutorials data from DE

get.summary: Get upgrade types data for global upgrades.
get.description: Upgrade types for what can be changed by global modifiers, such as double credit weekends.

get.summary: Get upgrade types data for global upgrades based on the query.
get.description: Upgrade types for what can be changed by global modifiers, such as double credit weekends.
Warframe stats and general information.

get.summary: Get data for the closest matching single item
get.description: Mod information.

get.summary: Get data for all matching Warframes
get.description: Warframe stats and general information.
Weapon statistics.

get.summary: Get data for the closest matching single weapon
get.description: Mod information.

get.summary: Get data for all matching weapons
get.description: Weapon statistics.

activation.description: ISO-8601 formatted timestamp for when the event began

expiry.description: ISO-8601 formatted timestamp for when the event is expected to end

startString.description: Short-time-formatted duration string representing the start of the event

active.description: Whether the event is currently active

countedItems.description: Items that have a quantity attached

color.description: RGB value as an int assigned to this reward

items.description: Items' names possible to be won

itemString.description: formatted string describing all included items

missionType.description: A Warframe mision type, the kind of game mode that the mission/node houses.

archwingRequired.description: Whether an Archwing is required for participating in the mision.

isSharkwing.description: Whether the mission takes place in a submerssible mission.

levelOverride.description: Override for the map on this mission

advancedSpawners.description: Array of strings denoting extra spawners for a mission

requiredItems.description: Items required to enter the mission

consumeRequiredItems.description: Whether the required items are consumed

eta.description: Short-formatted string estimating the time until the event/mission is closed

allOf.description: Mission to be completed to earn the reward
Faction of the boss controlling the archon hunt
Unlocalized Faction of the boss controlling the archon hunt

state.description: Describes the current time. e.g. "day" or "night"

shortString.description: A short description of the remaining time until the next day/night change.

darkSectorHistory.description: Describes a Dark Sector Historical Battle.

defender.description: Clan or alliance that was defending.

defenderIsAlliance.description: Whether the defender was an alliance.

attacker.description: Clan or alliance that was attacking.

winner.description: One of attacker or defender, whichever one won.

syndicateJob.description: A Job for a syndicate. Often called a bounty.

activation.description: Timestamp for when the job becomes active

expiry.description: Timestamp for when the job becomes inactive

type.description: What type of Job (Bounty) it is

minMR.description: Minimum Mastery Rank required to perform a job.

maximumScore.description: Maximum score to complete the event

currentScore.description: The current score for the event

largeInterval.description: Interval for the second intermediate score

description.description: The description or "subtitle" for the event.

node.description: Node that the event is taking place on

concurrentNodes.description: Nodes that the event is happening concurrently on

victimNode.description: Node that is being attacked & defended in the event.

scoreLocTag.description: Localized tag for the event score

health.description: Amount of health remaining for the target

interimSteps.description: Interim steps, marking progress towards the final goal.

goal.description: Score to each to achieve this step

subject.description: Title of the in-game mail received for completing the step.

message.description: Body of the in-game mail received for completing the step.

attachments.description: Attachments to the message. Unknown usage.

winnerCount.description: Suspected to be the number of persons who have completed this step.

type.description: Steps in the progress to completion

showTotalAtEndOfMission.description: Whether to show the total score at the end of the mission

regionDrops.description: Drops in the area around the event node

archwingDrops.description: Archwing Drops in effect while this event is active

asString.description: Attempt to summarize event in a short string. (Do not use).

metadata.description: Miscellaneous metadata in a string provided by Digital Extremes

scoreVar.description: Internal string used for unknown purpose

expired.description: Whether the fissure is still present

tierNum.description: Numeric tier corresponding to the tier

allOf.description: Always-English enemy faction name, allows keying for standarized displays

isStorm.description: Whether this fissure is a void storm

isHard.description: Whether this fissure is on the Steel Path

upgradeOperationValue.description: Value corresponding to performing the operation

eta.description: Formatted short string designating when the upgrade will expire.

desc.description: Plain text description of the global upgrade.

completion.description: percentage complete as a float value

eta.description: time string showing approximate time to the end of the invasion

nodeKey.description: i18n key for matching node (always english translation)

requiredRuns.description: How many runs of this mission are needed to qualify for the reward

fleeDamage.description: The percent damage that the enemy takes when it's defeated

region.description: The region in which the enemy is located

lastDiscoveredTime.description: The time at which the enemy was last discovered

lastDiscoveredAt.description: Node at which the enemy was last discovered

isDiscovered.description: Whether the enemy is currently discovered

isUsingTicketing.description: Whether the enemy is using 'ticketing'. Unknown usage.

pid.description: faux-id incorporating the actual description and Whether the enemy is discovered.

allOf.description: Faction of the boss controlling the sortie
Unlocalized Faction of the boss controlling the sortie

ducats.description: Amount of ducats required to purchase item

credits.description: Amount of credits required to purchase item

rivenStatistic.description: A colleciton of rivens about a specific weapon's riven sales

rivenCompatability.description: The name of the weapon that this riven is compatible with

rivenType.description: The type of riven that the child rivens belong to

slot.description: Specifies the slot of an item.

items.description: Region index to Region name mapping

language.name: Accept-Language
language.description: Language to retrieve. Doesn't always work with caching. See Language query string parameter.

language-query.name: language
language-query.description: Language to retrieve. With Caching, this has become required if you want your reply to always match your request.

only.name: only
only.description: Keys to keep on the object. Comma separated for multiple

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Keys to remove on the object. Comma separated for multiple

by.name: by
by.description: Key to search by on the object

code.description: HTTP status code associated with error
HTTP status code associated with error
